ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 130
ygData.msgSnippet: I happened to wander by and con them yesterday... the chief glowered dubiously at me, and was yellow at 33...so he is probably 35.  The guards were green and
ygData.messageBody:
I happened to wander by and con them yesterday... the chief glowered
dubiously at me, and was yellow at 33...so he is probably 35. The guards
were green and the shamans were blue, also at level 33, so they are much
lower. They were all amiable except the chief, so I didn't kill any <G>.
Also, the Chief said something about [enchanting the stone] when I hailed
him...and when I asked him about that, he said I had best be on my way and
wouldn't talk about it. I assume he was referring to the large stone they
are all standing around...anyone have more info or get something else out of
the chief?

Ma`ar, Innoruuk
><<
> They are found on the Ogres in W. Karana. It is on
> the Ogre Shaman and above if I recall, I wasn't paying
> attention which mob we got it from. I have one and
> like it very much. Not sure on the value though.
>
> Belgarth >>
>
>These ogres have lots of good stuff it seems. What Lvl are they?
>
>Wizaro Wratcaster
